Stats 5: Seminar in Data Science: Winter 2018

Seminar Speaker:  Dr. Kate Crawford, Microsoft Research (video lecture)
Date:  February 27th 2018

Your First Name:      
Your Last Name:  

By submitting this form you are verifying that you attended this lecture on the date above.


1. Write a 1 or 2 sentence description of what the word bias means when used in the context of machine learning systems




2. Explain briefly how bias is implicitly present in training data sets used to train machine learning systems
